articles.title: Hubble confirms largest comet nucleus ever seen - Nanowerk
articles.description: The nucleus is about 50 times larger than found at the heart of most known comets. Its mass is estimated to be a staggering 500 trillion tons, a hundred thousand times greater than the mass of a typical comet found much closer to the Sun.
